main.name: Robin Nguyen
main.description: I am a web development/ Network engineer. My Technical skills include HTML, CSS, Javascript, React/ Python, router/ switch/ server configuration
main.bio: I am a resourceful, self-motivated and certified network/programmer engineer with over 5 years of relevant and progressive experience in Information Technology.Having previously functioned in different positions from designing, configuring,programming and supporting various networks and security devices of multiple enterprise customers, I passionate everything about IT and constantly work towards developing my skills by learning new technologies.
main.contactmessage: If you have any questions, please do not hesitate to contact with me at any time

education.description: Project Management, Marketing, Business Strategy, Corporate Information System, Quality Management

education.school: University of Technology Ho Chi Minh City
education.description: Computer Network, Data Structure and Algorithms, Programming Language, Web Development, Software Engineering

work.title: Senior Network Automation Engineer
work.description:
Work with development teams to develop software and hardware systems
.Design, develop and execute test plans, automation tools with python, robot framework for networking features, equipment and systems (STP, RSTP, QoS, VLAN, PPP, IPv4, IPv6, 802.1X, LACP, DHCP, DNS, Firewall, NAT, RIP, EIGRP, OSPF, BGP ).

work.title: Network and System Engineer
work.description: Ensure the resiliency and 24x7 uptime in Product environment from the challenge of nature/man-made fault.Manage and troubleshoot problems in the web-centric platform (Web Server, Java Application Server, Database Server, Monitoring/Logging System)
